item.title: PHYS105-lab-20200402
item.description: Due in 3 weeks. The Ballistic Pendulum # 2 different ways to measure a projectile Watch the youtube video For the theory section: # How to find initial velocity: Measure the total height And the length in the x direction Kinematics Then find total time Solve for t Plug back in To make the calculations: Horizontal measurements Both of these together is x total Then measure vertical Add both together to get y total
